android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.USE_FINGERPRINT.description: This constant was deprecated in API level 28. Applications should request USE_BIOMETRIC instead

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.info: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity </br>(com.office.document.ActLauncher)
manifest_analysis.desc: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task. Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents from being read by another application.
manifest_analysis.name: TaskAffinity is set for Activity

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.office.document.ActLauncher) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.office.document.activity.ActNHome) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.android.gms.measurement.AppMeasurementInstallReferrerReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

playstore_details.title: Word Office - Docx, Slide, Excel, PDF Edit & View
playstore_details.description:
📝 Word Office Viewer - PDF, Slide, Excel, Docx editor, Word Reader has the ability to convert PDF and is able to read PDF files. The app supports a number of file types such as DOCX, RTF, DOT, PPTX, TXT and HTML amongst others. All documents are fully compatible with Office reader & viewer and Google Docx.

📝 The word office editor app allows you to securely encrypt your files with passkeys, and you can edit your documents without fear of losing your work thanks to the auto-save option. Main features include the ability to track changes, comments, edit and run spell checks.

► Word Office editor document - PDF reader, Slide, Excel, Word Reader KEY FEATURES:
✏ Read all word office editor files for docx viewer
✏ Load office documents editor, word editor, docx editor file, txt viewer, edit excel files
✏ Share word office reader & collaborate in the same document at the same time.
✏ Open word editor, documents editor, docx editor, office editor.
✏ Edit word viewer, documents viewer fastest and full option Document Editor
✏ Word Document reader can grid or list file display
✏ Directly open for office word reader for xls, docx or pdf files from file manager, email or web in this docx reader
✏ Search for docx files and explore more word office
✏ Edit documents like edit office word file, edit excel files, txt editor
✏ Word office viewer share your documents to save

★ Read & view office editor files of multiple formats
★ View docs in app of all docs reader by viewing the files or documents
★ Word office reader app has enough reading modules with file management as well
★ Search, Save & Create the PDF reader files quickly
★ Support various PPT features to make this tool more useable for you
★ Share Docx editor files easily through gmail

[Payment plan and auto-subscription]
• Word Office Viewer- PDF, Docx, Sheets, Slide Reader is free all-in-one office suite but some features can be limited by your cloud usage or your subscription option. Generally, you can use more features with reasonable price.
• You can upgrade  ($3/month & $30/year) to take advantage of more advanced functions. (The price is based at US dollar. Actual prices may vary depending on the currency of each country.)
• You can remove advertisement by purchasing Remove Ad for $3.99.
• Recurring payments and plan subscriptions are automatically processed. Your subscription will automatically renew.
• If you would like to stop your subscription, please cancel your subscription any time within 24 hours before the next renewal date. 

■ Supported formats 
• Word: DOC, DOCX 
• Excel: XLS, XLSX
• Slide: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX
• Other Office reader and files: PDF, TXT, ODT, Zip

📝[Information about permission]
• WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission is required when reading documents stored in Android SD card.
• READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission is required when reading Office documents stored in Android SD card or moving Office documents in other storage to SD card.
• GET_ACCOUNTS: This permission is required when connecting to Google Drive.
playstore_details.summary: Word office: Office reader, editor & viewer - TXT, Docs, PDF, PPT for android
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Word office: Office reader, editor & viewer - TXT, Docs, PDF, PPT for android
playstore_details.developerAddress: RM C, 18/F, HARVARD COMMERCIAL BUILDING, 185-168 THOMSON ROAD, WAN CHAI, HONG KONG
